name: DunkForce - JumpNice
description:
Bersaing dengan pemain lain untuk pertandingan

1v1!

Welcome to DunkForce! Invite your friends or

other players to a real-time online competition!

Start a fast-paced 1v1 multiplayer basketball match! Dash and steal the ball from your opponent, go for slam dunks, fire off 3-point shots and time your leaps to block your opponent's shots!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS OR REAL PLAYERS Try your duelling instincts in 1v1 Matches, or in real-time tournaments. Be the champion to get exciting rewards!

LEVEL UP YOUR STARS Win scores and unlock super stars! Level your stars up to grow power and style, and take on the world's best!

HUNDREDS OF UNIQUE ITEMS Advance your career like real! Unlock hundreds of unique items to equip your basketball stars, supply their nutrition and grow their ability!

KEY FEATURES

Real-time 1v1 basketball gameplay

Unlock new stars, gears and items

Simple yet skillful touch controls

Dribble, shoot, steal, jump, block and dunk -

all the excitement in a single match!

Earn more scores and rank to the top of the

leaderboard!

Free to play!

Come to join us now! We are DunkForce!
